name: WhoseTurnisitAnyway
0:
”Alexa, open Whose Turn”
”Alexa, ask Whose Turn who should take out the trash”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: whose turn
des: Next time you're trying to decide whose turn it is pick something or perform a task, just ask Alexa for help. For example, if you're trying to decide whose turn it is to pick a movie on movie night, Alexa can randomly select someone's name from list you create of household members. Even if you're trying to decide who should take out the trash, Alexa can help with that too! Open the magic hat! It’s 100% random or you can set to go through your list in order like for a chore list.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
